Package kdl.prox.rdnview

Class Summary
Arc Represents a dependency arc from a type count or variable to a variable.
PNodeLayout Utility class for laying out select PNodes in a Piccolo PCanvas.
RDNCanvas A PCanvas that knows how to display and re-arrange RDNs (Relational Dependency Networks).
RDNInput Encapsulates input to RDNCanvas.
RDNJFrame A JFrame that displays a saved RDN as a graph, using the Piccolo-based RDNCanvas.
RPTReader Reads information from the RPTs for the RDN.
RPTSourceInfo A simple class to store information that needs to be passed around
